channel.title: CVE Feed for brian-chappell -- Follow Me Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for brian-chappell -- Follow Me Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-3240|2024-08-03T01:00:10.849Z -- brian-chappell -- follow%20me%20plugin
item.description: The "Follow Me Plugin" plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery in versions up to, and including, 3.1.1. This is due to missing nonce validation on the FollowMeIgniteSocialMedia_options_page() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to modify the plugin's settings and inject malicious JavaScript via a forged request granted they can trick a site administrator into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
